text: Va [dar in hangom] kasone, ki [dar dunjo az rahʙaroni gumrohgar] pajravī karda ʙudand, megūjand: "Koş ʙaroi mo ʙozgaşte [ʙa dunjo] ʙud, to hamon guna, ki onon az mo ʙezorī çustand, [mo niz] az onho ʙezorī çūem. Alloh taolo cunin raftori eşonro, ki mojai hasrataşon ast, ʙa onho nişon medihad va hargiz az otaşi [dūzax] ʙerun naxohand omad
